name: Light and Darkness Dragon Lord
text:
1 Level 8 LIGHT Dragon monster + 1 Level 8 DARK Dragon monster
Must be Fusion Summoned. While face-up on the field, this card is also DARK-Attribute. Once per Chain, when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated (Quick Effect): This card loses exactly 1000 ATK/DEF, and if it does, negate the activation. If this card is destroyed by your opponent: You can target 1 Dragon monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
